long_description: The Whispbar Heavy Duty XBars earn their keep. Highly adaptable for work and play, this heavy-duty system not only carries your boats and snowboards, it hauls lumber and ladders with ease. 4 bar lengths available: T16 = 1,200mm/47.25 in.; T17 = 1,375mm/54 in.; T18 = 1,500mm/59 inches in.; T19 = 1,800mm/71 in. Vehicle-specific Whispbar SmartFoot fitting kit (sold separately) is required for installation; refer to Rack Fitting Guide to find your kit. Whispbar crossbars are designed with an aerofoil shape (think airplane wing) that allows air to pass over with less resistance, reducing drag and increasing fuel efficiency. Includes bars, integrated towers and mounting hardware. Rubber load strips are integrated into the aluminum crossbars to protect bars and loads. Whispbar accommodates most universal attachments and t-slot attachments for bike, water, snow and cargo accessories. Integrated tie down point for securing loads. Locks and 2 SKS keys are included. Whispbar Heavy Duty XBars have a maximum hauling load of 220 lbs./100kg. Please use the Yakima fit guide to select proper Whispbar lengths for your vehicle.
short_description: The Whispbar Heavy Duty XBars earn their keep. Highly adaptable for work and play, this heavy-duty system not only carries your boats and snowboards, it hauls lumber and ladders with ease.
